src.clf.lr_training module¶

Description:

Training a logistic regression model for predicting probabilities of medical specialties

src.clf.lr_training.grid_search(X_train: Series, y_train: Series, model_pipeline: Pipeline, param_grid: list[dict[str, list[float]]]) → Pipeline¶
